MirandaTutorial.speech0: Listen up: we don’t have much time so you need to get the hang of this gauntlet quickly. If you shoot at an object, sometimes it’ll react to the electricity. Use the right mouse button to try it out.
MirandaTutorial.speech1: If it comes down to it, you might need to engage in close combat. Use the left mouse button to throw a punch.
MirandaTutorial.speech2: If you fall, the lampposts around the city will help guide you back. Make sure you turn on any you pass. The wiring is a bit temperamental, so only one lamp will light at a time.
MirandaTutorial.speech3: Familiarize yourself with the city and find Atticus and Sullivan east of here. Go on, get to it.

AtticusLevel1.speech2: Aliver, this probably isn't the best time to chit-chat.

SullivanLevel1.speech0: How's it going? The airship ready yet?
